oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of new thermotropic liquid crystalline polyurethanes containing biphenyl mesogens using a novel AB-type self-polycondensation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RANGANATHAN, T
RAMESH, C
KUMAR, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: hyperbranched polyurethanes
2,6-tolylene diisocyanate
flexible spacer
6 methylene
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A series of thermotropic main chain liquid crystalline polyurethanes containing biphenyl mesogens and flexible methylene spacers were synthesized using the novel AB-type self-polycondensation approach for the first time.
